history.proof: intros. unfold sign. destruct (total_order_T 0 x) as [[Hx | Hx] | Hx]. + lra. + sfirstorder use: Rlt_irrefl. + reflexivity.

exceptions.exn: In environment x : R H : x < 0 Hx : 0 < x Unable to unify "sign ?M2295 = 1" with "1 = -1".
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros x H. unfold sign. destruct (total_order_T 0 x) as [[Hx | Hx] | Hx]. + apply sign_eq_1. lra. + contradicts H Hx. + reflexivity.
